attributes.action: Prosecute those planning to break the arms embargo. There is no
attributes.additional_details: It is against international law to break the arms embargo on supplying the terrorist entities within Syria with weoponary. Unfortunately some members of the UK parliament think they are above any legal or moral law. The terrorists in Syria have committed unspeakable attroicities and the UN has stated that they and not the government have used Chemical Weapons. Any company found to be supplying these Terrorists should be fined and sanctioned. Any minister promoting such actions should be procecuted for 'Crime Against Humanity'
